statements: UPDATE predictions SET prediction='A', market_outcome='Positive' WHERE prediction_id=1;
UPDATE predictions SET market_outcome='Negative', payout_distribution='Flat' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE predictions SET prediction = 'Updated Prediction 1', market_outcome = 'Outcome 1', payout_distribution = 'Distribution 1' WHERE prediction_id = 1;
UPDATE predictions SET payout_distribution = 'Distribution 2', prediction = 'Updated Prediction 2', market_outcome = 'Outcome 2' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserPredictions SET prediction_value = 0.75 WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE MarketOutcomes SET payout_distribution = 0.85, outcome_value = 1.25 WHERE market_id = 201
UPDATE UserPredictions SET prediction_value = 0.75, prediction_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE MarketOutcomes SET outcome_value = 1.25, payout_distribution = 0.45 WHERE market_id = 456;
UPDATE UserPredictions SET prediction = 'Win', prediction_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE MarketOutcomes SET outcome = 'Yes', market_time = '2023-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE market_id = 5;
UPDATE UserPredictions SET prediction = 'Correct', prediction_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE PayoutDistributions SET payout_amount = 1000.50, payout_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_predictions SET prediction_value = 0.75 WHERE user_id = 1 AND market_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET user_balance = 300.50, user_email = 'example@gmail.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_predictions SET prediction_value = 0.75, prediction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 101 AND market_id = 201;
UPDATE payout_distributions SET payout_amount = 50.25, payout_date = '2022-11-20' WHERE market_id = 201 AND user_id = 101;
UPDATE Predictions SET prediction_text = 'New prediction text' WHERE prediction_id = 1
UPDATE MarketOutcomes SET outcome_text = 'Updated outcome text', outcome_date = '2022-10-30' WHERE outcome_id = 3
UPDATE Predictions SET prediction_text = 'Updated prediction text', prediction_date = '2021-12-31' WHERE prediction_id = 1;
UPDATE PayoutDistributions SET payout_amount = 1000.50, payout_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE prediction_id = 5;
